name: Counter-Attack: Desert Strike
description:
Counter-Attack: Desert Strike [EARLY ACCESS]

CA:DS is a small project that I started, so I could play something new with friends.

The game runs on unity and is powered by PUN 2 (Photon Unity Networking).

The game only allows 20 players on the servers at once, because we use the free plan, as we have no funding for larger servers, such as the 100 ccu plan.

If you donate to the project, we might be able to actually expand and add more maps and content for you to play.

This is the in game menu. Loading screen.
